result.title: need help..
result.content: I am trying to solve this problem. There is a tutorial but for me its not so clear. You can see that I am green. For me the state is [numberOfProgrammer][numberOfLine][maxBug] which is 500*500*500. The tutorial has a solution with state 2*500*500. It is very hard for me to understand the state elimination. Someone please explain the solution so that I(as a green) can understand.
